data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 3, Everton Ribeiro of Flamengo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Atletico Mineiro take a 1-0 lead thanks to Eduardo Sasha.
Jefferson Savarino with an assist there.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 6, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Goal! Atletico Mineiro extend their lead to 2-0 through Keno.
In the minute 8, That's a fine assist from Jefferson Savarino.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Belo Horizonte to check on Keno, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Keno has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Flamengo are coming forward and Thiago Maia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 24, Flamengo to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 26, Thiago Maia for Flamengo has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 28, Gerson for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick Flamengo.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Alan Franco gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Bruno Henrique for Flamengo drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 37, In Belo Horizonte, Natan (Flamengo) misses the target with a header.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Everson for Atletico Mineiro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 39, Everson for Atletico Mineiro is back on the field again.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Flamengo's half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Eduardo Sasha.
In the minute 41, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Flamengo surge into the attack at Independencia but Natanâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Alan Franco is booked for the home team.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Savio Pereira Sampaio will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Everton Ribeiro (Flamengo) has received a yellow card from Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 46, Savio Pereira Sampaio has blown to start the second-half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pedro (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, Flamengo's Pedro goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Keno. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 48, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Independencia.
In the minute 50, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 52, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Flamengo drive upfield and Gerson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 53, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Flamengo.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro move into a more comfortable 3-0 lead. Eduardo Sasha is the scorer with a header!
Great play from Guilherme Arana to set up the goal.
In the minute 60, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Flamengo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Eduardo Sasha's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Independencia.
In the minute 62, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Important block from the Atletico Mineiro defence as Gerson fires in a strike for Flamengo.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Flamengo.
In Belo Horizonte Flamengo drive forward through Pedro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Thiago Maia with Michael. This is the first substitution made today by Domenec Torrent Font.
Domenec Torrent Font is making the team's second substitution at Independencia with Rene replacing Filipe Luis.
Atletico Mineiro needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Bueno is on a sub for Eduardo Sasha for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick Flamengo.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 73, Attention is being given to Atletico Mineiroâ€™s Guga and play has been suspended briefly.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Atletico Mineiro's area.
Guga returns to the field for Atletico Mineiro after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 76, Gerson (Flamengo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Atletico Mineiroâ€™s Keno is on his feet again at Independencia.
The match at Independencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Keno, who is down injured.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a third substitution, with Lincoln replacing Everton Ribeiro.
In the minute 78, Gabriel Barbosa is replacing Pedro for Flamengo at Independencia.
Allan for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 79, Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Lincoln gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Guga, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Federico Zaracho is the substitute for Atletico Mineiro.
Marrony (Atletico Mineiro) has replaced the possibly injured Keno at Independencia.
In the minute 83, Federico Zaracho puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-0.
That's a fine assist from Jefferson Savarino.
Free kick Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, At Independencia, Junior Alonso has been yellow-carded for the home team.
At Independencia, Marrony has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 86, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Mauricio Isla for Flamengo has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fourth substitution at Independencia with Gabriel replacing Rever.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 87, Atletico Mineiro make their fifth substitution with Dylan Borrero replacing Allan.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 89, Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
Dylan Borrero (Atletico Mineiro) has received a first yellow card.
